title: The Psalmes of David from the new translation of the Bible turned into meter to be sung after the old tunes used in the churches : unto which are newly added the Lord's prayer, the Creed, the Ten commandments, with some other ancient hymnes.
author: King, Henry, 1592-1669.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by S.G. and are to be sold by Humphrey Moseley ...,
